description.en:
COSMIC
EXTRA POWER & LOCKED IN STABILITY

 

If you want that little bit extra power and locked in stability without the hassle of  traditional cambered sails, the COSMIC delivers greatness that you won’t believe till you sail it!

The COSMIC is designed for enthusiastic Freeride Blasters looking for a sail with a little more bottom end power and drive to get you going and keep you charging through the lulls. This 2 cambered powerhouse is simple and effortless to rig, light in the hands like you can’t believe and furiously fast!

The new COSMIC´s twin cam system has all the grunt you need to breeze through lulls and reach new top speeds. A new reduced constant curve luff design keeps the sail maneuverable and a new outline with smaller head improves on water power agility and dynamic response of the sail. A performance panel layout with lightweight luff pocket reduces overall weight of the rig to keep up-hauling and water starting simple.

 

New for 2017:

New constant curve Luff curve and sail outline.
Increased POSI-LEECH with new dynamic cut-out.
Reduced boom through new inset clew geometry
Redesigned foot geometry
New Lightweight simplified panel layout improves strength and weight
New Optimised batten layouts with 7 battens from 7.2 up and 6 battens from 6.7 down
BEN VAN DER STEEN

“The Cosmic is prefect for sailing where the wind is feeling thin and less powerful. The cosmic can’t be beaten for early planing and lightness in the hands. It handles choppy water with ease, keeps accelerating and never gets tired, always on the go!”
